info.task: navigate to next option in listbox popup
info.title: Navigate to the next option in a listbox popup in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAlabamaInListbox
setupScript.description: expands the combobox, sets the combobox value to 'Alabama' and places focus on that option in the listbox popup

user: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, navigate forwards to the next option.
instructions.raw: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, navigate forwards to the next option.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('States') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Alaska') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (2) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (56) is conveyed
